description: yeehaa is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy, blending academia and tech expertise. As an entrepreneur, thinker, and coder, he's dedicated to transforming education and knowledge sharing. He founded Offcourse and created the Superconnectors event format, advocating for an impactful and inclusive internet. Based in Taipei, yeehaa focuses on uniting people around common values and translating shared visions into effective ecosystems. His work explores concepts like ecosystem architecture, internet fragmentation, and decentralized innovation. yeehaa's blog posts and curated courses cover topics ranging from digital landscapes and societal metaphors to practical innovation and breaking down organizational silos.
blurb: yeehaa: Ecosystem architect, PhD philosopher, and tech entrepreneur transforming education and fostering inclusive digital innovation.
